TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorContext extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to get the color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
[!code-cs[bitmapimageprops#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/BitmapImageProps/BitmapImageProps.cs#3)] [!code-vb[bitmapimageprops#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/BitmapImageProps/BitmapImageProps.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri profileUri) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile located at a given <xref:System.Uri>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the ColorContext constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat pixelFormat) cil managed

Docs.param: The from which the is derived.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied .
